title: Will we pay Bitcoin for Starbucks coffee?
body:
The New York Stock Exchange founded the company "Intercontinental Exchange", a subsidiary of the New York Stock Exchange in cooperation with Starbucks, Microsoft and BCG. All the above companies are developing the "Bakkt" internet platform to buy, sell, store and issue cryptocurrencies. Does this mean that we will pay for Bitcoin soon for Frappucinno?

Well, no.
gallery: \- It is important to clarify that we do not accept digital content at Starbucks. Instead, the exchange will convert digital assets, such as Bitcoin, into US dollars that can be used in Starbucks. Customers will not be able to pay Bitcoin for Frappuccino - the company's representative explained in an interview with the journalists "Motherboard".
